4/7

Description: Boisterous hangout featuring draft brews, American plates & many sports TVs, plus DJs & dancing.

summary.snippet: "Great staff, great food, and the best place to be for a game or Saturday night!"
"Terrible service, took over 2 hours to sit down and eat bar food!!"
"They have great music and decent service for drinks."

most_relevant.description: So, we stopped by for a drink before a show at the Michigan Theater. Great experience great beer and drinks but the bartender was straight up picking his nose and did not wash his hands. Go for an authentic dive experience. Love the place

Localized dive bar experience. Good for new students to party together. But can get really dirty by the end of the night. And everything can be sticky from time to time. Only go if your looking to drink on the weekend.
It'd just bar food nothing to write a restaurant review for but it sobered me up and was perfectly cooked. Nicest staff they always take care of me!!
This is the best bar in the world. Great staff, great food, and the best place to be for a game or Saturday night!
Awesome place! Super fun dance atmosphere and a great place to watch a game!!! Also the chicken fingers are the best!!!!

We went to Ann Arbor for a bar crawl and this was one of the stops. While the staff wasn't rude, I guess, they definitely were not friendly. The drinks might have well been water. We each got a mix drink pitcher(32oz) and left more sober than we arrived. Wasting money and time.

this bar is so extremely racist. we got in line and waited 1.5 hours only for us to get in the front and tell us THAT WE CUT. we waited fair and square for so long and they assumed based on race. if you are anything but white DO NOT COME HERE. skeeps is racist and rude.
Fun, honest, all-American bar, doesn't get any better than this
